hero.desc: I'm an experienced front-end developer specialized in crafting performant and scalable websites and web applications. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular and ReactJS, I create seamless and engaging web experiences.

list.title: Junior Software Engineer - Coop

content.heading: Company
content.content: Ministry Of Children, Community and Social Services

content: â€¢ Enhanced website accessibility for users of screen reader tools, ensuring a seamless and inclusive browsing experience; utilized knowledge of accessibility standards for testing and review of platforms
â€¢ Updated and optimized website content to enhance user engagement and relevance
â€¢ Developed comprehensive test cases to rigorously evaluate website functionality, identifying and rectifying bugs for improved user experience
â€¢ Created detailed documentation outlining various workflows in a cookbook format, facilitating efficient onboarding and knowledge transfer within the team
â€¢ Developed an immersive and interactive 3D book featuring profiles of all company interns during their internship period using turnjs

list.title: Junior Web Developer
content: â€¢ Worked in the revamp of 30+ web-pages for the branding website of the product called Setmore, following best practices to achieve high performance scores and ensuring the pages are mobile friendly and load fast
â€¢ Collaborated with the design, content and marketing teams to ensure all developed web pages meet the requirements set-forth by the individual teams and are delivered within the deadline
â€¢ Developed and maintained the front-end code for 5 microservices that the product encompasses, ensuring the UI components developed are mobile friendly
â€¢ Inspected the web app for UI issues along with the testing team and resolved issues identified quickly
â€¢ Accelerated website migration to Next.js by developing internal tools to automate recurring tasks
â€¢ Mentored 4 web development interns and conducted reviews and mock reviews for several interns
â€¢ Assisted customers with their queries on the product as a support staff on a weekly basis
â€¢ Collaborated with product owner/manager, designers, software developers and testers to deliver the sprint items within the given timeframe

list.title: Web Development Intern
content: â€¢ Learned about web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript and build tools such as gulp, webpack and developed 5 email templates, 4 web pages and 3 web apps.

â€¢ Implemented performance improvements techniques such as minification and compression of html, css and js files, optimizing images, identifying and reducing layout shifts, lazy loading less-priority and below the fold assets, preloading high priority assets on the developed sites
â€¢ Note: Due to college examinations, I had to take a break from internship in the month of September. So my internship duration is in total 3 months.
